docs.text: Custom Domain Guide This guide is to make you learn the following: Get a FREE domain using freenom Use Cloudflare to allow us to point out domain to our GitHub page Change Cloudfalre domain settings to secure our site and the users visiting it To get started with the guide go here Security

docs.text: Custom Domain Guide The guide will show you the basic setup on how to get a domain from one domain provider ( Freenom ) and Cloudflare .
